channel.title: Please read and see if you can help
channel.description: Okay I want to get serious in gaming like making a game from scratch like they did with "Runescape". But I cannot find any decent tutorials on how to make my own 3D MMORPG from scratch. Although I have read a few articles saying to start of by making "Runescape" Private Servers" as it is a good base on learning small amounts of "Java Coding" but others say that it is a disgrace to start making a "Runescape" Private Server" as it is a copy of "Runescape" with hardly any educated Java codes and people thinking that they are great at Java when really they are fucking about with codes and giving themselves a self feel of accomplishment. Is this true?, should I start of by making a "Runescape Private Server" or continue on my search to finding how to make a "Real Game" from scratch?

item.title: Please read and see if you can help
item.dc:creator: @Just_Lurkin Just Lurkin
item.description:
@Just_Lurkin wrote:

Like he said you need to study Java…
And it would take a pretty long time to make a decent game alone using Java.

Read full topic
item.source: Please read and see if you can help

item.title: Please read and see if you can help

@Katagon34 wrote:

Okay thanks i’ll take that into consideration.

item.title: Please read and see if you can help
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

Unfortunately, you have to read books on java. I know I hate them to. But, I don’t see any harm in starting off of RSPS’s. You’re not going to pull a 3d game out of your ass. You have to study java. You’re also not going to find tutorials on it because it takes a long time to make a game.

Overall, read a book on java, start off with RSPS, gradually make your knowledge on java stronger, and then try to create the game.
Good luck. Btw, I think this goes in general programming.

Read full topic
item.source: Please read and see if you can help
